## Feature Description
A clear and concise description of the feature you'd like.

## Use Case
Describe the problem this feature would solve or the use case it enables.

**Example:**
> As a policy analyst, I want to export data in PDF format so that I can include it in reports.

## Proposed Solution
Describe how you envision this feature working.

## Alternative Solutions
Describe any alternative solutions or workarounds you've considered.

## Additional Context
Add any other context, screenshots, or mockups about the feature request.

- [ ] Yes, I'd like to submit a PR
- [ ] I can help with testing
- [ ] I can help with documentation
- [ ] No, I'm just suggesting
